level.heading: Collection and deposit of fees.
level.text: All fees collected by the Department under this subchapter shall be deposited with the D.C. treasurer and credited to the Corporate Recordation Fund ("Fund") as defined in § 29-102.13.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "Corporate Recordation Fund ("Fund") as defined in § 29-102.13" for "master business license fund as defined in § 47-2851.13."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

level.heading: Short Title
level.text: Short title of title II of Law 12-261: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2855.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
